page.title: 08A CHILD'S WEEKEND-HATHERDEN.
page.content: On a typical Sunday I wake_up at about 7 o'clock in the morning and read until about 8 o'clock.Then I have a bowl of Frosties with milk and a glass of apple juice.That takes me to about 8:15 and then I go to get changed for football.I am a member of Thatcham Tornadoes who play near Newbury.I have played for them for three years and this season we won our Under 11 league. That takes me till 12:30 when I go for lunch.After that I go birdwatching with my Dad in Long Parish which is by the River Test.I use 10x50 binoculars and have seen a pied flycatcher which is not usually found in England.That takes me about two hours and when I get home I go out and play on my B.M.X bike until tea at 6:30.Then I read until bed at 9 o'clock. Paul Wood aged 11.
